people.name: George W. Bush
people.description: George Walker Bush  is an American politician who was the 43rd President of the United States from 2001 to 2009 and 46th Governor of Texas from 1995 to 2000.

people.name: Mahathir Mohamad
people.description: Tun Dato' Seri Dr Mahathir bin Mohamad  is a Malaysian politician who was the fourth Prime Minister of Malaysia from 1981 to 2003, making him longest-serving holder of that office.

people.name: Danny Glover
people.description: Danny Lebern Glover  is an American actor, film director, and political activist.

people.name: Lindiwe Hendricks
people.description: Lindiwe Benedicta Hendricks  is a South African politician and a member of the National Assembly.

people.name: Marthinus van Schalkwyk
people.description: Marthinus Christoffel Johannes  van Schalkwyk , an apartheid era intelligence operative, academic, lawyer, politician is a former MP and Minister of Tourism in the Cabinet of South Africa.

people.name: Buyelwa Sonjica
people.description: Buyelwa Patience Sonjica  is a South African politician who served as Minister of Water and Environmental Affairs from May 2009 until November 2010.

people.name: Eric Szwarczynski
people.description: Eric Szwarczynski  is a South African-born Dutch cricket player.

people.name: Tim Swiel
people.description: Timothy Gregory Swiel  is an English-born South African rugby union player, currently playing for Harlequins in the Aviva Premiership.

people.name: Membathisi Mdladlana
people.description: Membathisi Mdladlana  is a South African politician.
